name: Retro: Showdown
description:
Retro: Showdown is a survival horror game that takes influence from the modern title 

Hunt : Showdown and puts it in the style of a Doom-shooter on the PlayStation 1. Take over as a hunter and explore the land to find clues that will lead you to your prey. Will you die on the hunt, or live to die another day?

Controls:

W A S D: Movement

Left Click: Shoot

R: Reload

E:  Dark Sight (Use this if you ever get lost or don't know what to do)

F: Interact

Escape: Pause

Side Effects within the game:

-The more clues you get the stronger the undead become!

-When bitten by a zombie random side effects are applied to the player!

Windows edition runs better than the browser version and has scarier corn fields!
